DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this randomized trial is to investigate the effects of a 12-week yoga intervention compared to no specific intervention on weight-related outcomes, well-being, and health behaviour in 60 females with abdominal obesity.
DOC.criteria: Waist circumference at least 88cm Body mass index at least 25 Sedentary Physical and mental ability to participate in the yoga intervention Willingness to participate in at least 18 of 24 yoga sessions and the wholeday workshop Dementia Psychosis Severe hypertension (diastolic blood pressure more than 120mmHg) Type 1 diabetes or insulindependent 2 diabetes Coronary artery disease Myocardial infarction Lung embolism Stroke Regular physical activity or yoga practice Pregnancy
